prompts: Create a powerful Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a strong bull with a brown coat.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that charges at its enemies with horns and a determined look.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and ferocity, with a muscular build and impressive horns.
Imagine a Pokemon living in grasslands, known for its speed and tenacity during battles.
Design a creature with a unique tail and a striking dark mane, perfect for a tough fighter.
Make a Pokemon that showcases both calm and aggressive traits, with a sturdy body and sharp horns.
Give me a depiction of a Pokemon that roams freely in nature, merging power with grace.
